plentry.pd: (0): Default audio scenario. The SDK automatically selects the appropriate audio quality based on user role and audio routing.
(3): High-quality audio scenario, suitable for music playback scenarios such as instrument teaching.
(5): Chatroom audio scenario, suitable for scenarios where users frequently switch roles or mute/unmute the microphone, such as online education.
(7): Real-time chorus audio scenario, suitable for scenarios with good network conditions and ultra-low latency requirements.
(8): Meeting audio scenario, mainly used for voice transmission.
(10): AI conversational audio scenario, only applicable to scenarios where users interact with conversational agents created by Conversational AI Engine.
